zh-tw.username_rule_msg: 帳號請輸入{min}-{max}個字元，僅可輸入小寫英文字母以及數字的組合
zh-tw.quick_payment_with_comment: 快速存款_未登入不開放(請先檢查是否開放新支付平台)
zh-tw.multi_wallet_comment: 會員自選轉出 / 轉入的遊戲平台
zh-tw.transless_wallet_comment: 會員不須額度轉換，系統自動將餘額轉入開啟的遊戲平台
zh-tw.two_wallet_comment_1: 會員自由選擇使用多錢包或免轉錢包
zh-tw.two_wallet_comment_2: 會員由多錢包切換至免轉錢包，系統自動執行一鍵歸戶
zh-tw.two_wallet_comment_3: 設定儲存生效後，系統自動將會員錢包重設為預設值
zh-tw.registration_email_setting: 會員註冊認證信箱設定
zh-tw.regexp_of_account_v2: 請輸入{min}-{max}個字元，僅可輸入小寫英文字母以及數字的組合
zh-tw.667108003: 資料已存在, 請確認後再輸入!
zh-tw.domain_lobby_info_2: 保留原層級設定：保留當前有「單獨設定」大股東-代理層級，在廳主開啟遊戲時不受影響
zh-tw.at_least_change_1_domain: 請至少異動 1 家廳主
zh-tw.domain_lobby_info_1_1: 為一次性操作，只對儲存當下「存在的帳號」設定，儲存後選項還原至「保留原層級設定」
zh-tw.domain_lobby_info_1_2: 未來「新增的帳號」若所屬上層沒有異動過，則帳號一律設為開啟；新增遊戲平台時亦同
zh-tw.domain_lobby_alert_1: 為一次性操作，只對儲存當下「存在的帳號」設定，儲存後選項還原至「保留原層級設定」
zh-tw.domain_lobby_info_3_2: 開啟遊戲平台時，請至「{link}」同步開啟遊戲開關
zh-tw.warning_msg: 此次儲存未異動任何內容
zh-tw.platform_game_settings_error_2: 送出廳主總共 {total} 筆，失敗 {fail_count} 筆
zh-tw.domain_lobby_alert_3: 「只開廳主」需花費長時間執行強制關閉該廳所有大股東-代理層級，請確認是否執行以下廳主：
zh-tw.domain_lobby_alert_2: 為一次性操作，只對儲存當下「存在的帳號」設定，確定關閉？
zh-tw.perm_affect_alert: 將滑鼠移至權限上，可於【？】圖示，查看影響的功能
zh-tw.enter_account_setting_name_to_search: 輸入帳號設定名稱來搜尋
zh-tw.enter_lobby_setting_name_to_search: 輸入遊戲設定名稱來搜尋
zh-tw.enter_hierarchy_name_to_search: 輸入體系權限名稱來搜尋
zh-tw.perm_affect_alert_special: 將滑鼠移至特殊權限上，可於【？】圖示，查看影響的功能
zh-tw.detect_disabled_item: 偵測到 {num} 個無法異動的項目

zh-cn.username_rule_msg: 帐号请输入{min}-{max}个字元，仅可输入小写英文字母以及数字的组合
zh-cn.quick_payment_with_comment: 快速存款_未登入不开放(请先检查是否开放新支付平台)
zh-cn.multi_wallet_comment: 会员自选转出 / 转入的游戏平台
zh-cn.transless_wallet_comment: 会员不须额度转换，系统自动将余额转入开启的游戏平台
zh-cn.two_wallet_comment_1: 会员自由选择使用多钱包或免转钱包
zh-cn.two_wallet_comment_2: 会员由多钱包切换至免转钱包，系统自动执行一键归户
zh-cn.two_wallet_comment_3: 设定储存生效后，系统自动将会员钱包重设为预设值
zh-cn.registration_email_setting: 会员注册认证信箱设定
zh-cn.regexp_of_account_v2: 请输入{min}-{max}个字元，仅可输入小写英文字母以及数字的组合
zh-cn.667108003: 资料已存在, 请确认后再输入!
zh-cn.domain_lobby_info_2: 保留原层级设定：保留当前有「单独设定」大股东-代理层级，在厅主开启游戏时不受影响
zh-cn.at_least_change_1_domain: 请至少异动 1 家厅主
zh-cn.domain_lobby_info_1_1: 为一次性操作，只对储存当下「存在的帐号」设定，储存后选项还原至「保留原层级设定」
zh-cn.domain_lobby_info_1_2: 未来「新增的帐号」若所属上层没有异动过，则帐号一律设为开启；新增游戏平台时亦同
zh-cn.domain_lobby_alert_1: 为一次性操作，只对储存当下「存在的帐号」设定，储存后选项还原至「保留原层级设定」
zh-cn.domain_lobby_info_3_2: 开启游戏平台时，请至「{link}」同步开启游戏开关
zh-cn.warning_msg: 此次储存未异动任何内容
zh-cn.platform_game_settings_error_2: 送出厅主总共 {total} 笔，失败 {fail_count} 笔
zh-cn.domain_lobby_alert_3: 「只开厅主」需花费长时间执行强制关闭该厅所有大股东-代理层级，请确认是否执行以下厅主：
zh-cn.domain_lobby_alert_2: 为一次性操作，只对储存当下「存在的帐号」设定，确定关闭？
zh-cn.perm_affect_alert: 将滑鼠移至权限上，可于【？】图示，查看影响的功能
zh-cn.enter_account_setting_name_to_search: 输入帐号设定名称来搜寻
zh-cn.enter_lobby_setting_name_to_search: 输入游戏设定名称来搜寻
zh-cn.enter_hierarchy_name_to_search: 输入体系权限名称来搜寻
zh-cn.perm_affect_alert_special: 将滑鼠移至特殊权限上，可于【？】图示，查看影响的功能
zh-cn.detect_disabled_item: 侦测到 {num} 个无法异动的项目

en.username_rule_msg: Account must be {min}~{max} characters and only can have small letters and numbers.
en.quick_payment_with_comment: Quick deposit _ not logged in and not open (please check if you open the new payment platform first)
en.transless_wallet_comment: Members do not need to convert the amount, the system automatically transfers the balance to the open gaming platform.
en.two_wallet_comment_1: Members are free to choose to use multi-wallet or no-turn wallet
en.two_wallet_comment_2: Members switch from multi-wallet to free-to-return wallet, the system automatically performs one-click homing
en.two_wallet_comment_3: After the setting storage takes effect, the system automatically resets the member wallet to the default value.
en.regexp_of_account_v2: Please input at least {min}-{max} characters, with only lower cases and numeric combinations
en.667108003: Data has existed, please confirm and re-enter!
en.domain_lobby_info_2: Reserve the original level settings: Reserve the current Supreme shareholder-Agent Level which has “individual setting”.
en.domain_lobby_info_1_1: It’s a one-time operation. Only the current “existing accounts” can be taken effect. Once saved, the selected items will be returned to “reserve original settings”.
en.domain_lobby_info_1_2: In the future, if the “new account’s” upper level hasn’t been changed, account will be set to On. The same goes for new Game Hall.
en.domain_lobby_alert_1: It’s a one-time operation. Only the current “existing accounts” can be taken effect. Once saved, the selected items will be returned to “reserve original settings”.
en.domain_lobby_info_3_2: When open a Game Hall, please go to “{link}” to turn on the game switch at the same time.
en.platform_game_settings_error_2: 送出厅主总共 {total} 笔，失败 {fail_count} 笔
en.domain_lobby_alert_3: 「只开厅主」需花费长时间执行强制关闭该厅所有大股东-代理层级，请确认是否执行以下厅主：
en.domain_lobby_alert_2: It’s a one-time operation. Only the current “existing accounts” can be taken effect. Do you want to close?
en.perm_affect_alert: 将滑鼠移至权限上，可于【？】图示，查看影响的功能
en.enter_account_setting_name_to_search: 输入帐号设定名称来搜寻
en.enter_lobby_setting_name_to_search: 输入游戏设定名称来搜寻
en.enter_hierarchy_name_to_search: 输入体系权限名称来搜寻
en.perm_affect_alert_special: 将滑鼠移至特殊权限上，可于【？】图示，查看影响的功能

ko.username_rule_msg: 아이디는 {min}-{max}자를 입력하시며 소문자 및 숫자의 조합만 한합니다.
ko.quick_payment_with_comment: Quick deposit _ not logged in and not open (please check if you open the new payment platform first)
ko.transless_wallet_comment: Members do not need to convert the amount, the system automatically transfers the balance to the open gaming platform.
ko.two_wallet_comment_1: Members are free to choose to use multi-wallet or no-turn wallet
ko.two_wallet_comment_2: Members switch from multi-wallet to free-to-return wallet, the system automatically performs one-click homing
ko.two_wallet_comment_3: After the setting storage takes effect, the system automatically resets the member wallet to the default value.
ko.regexp_of_account_v2: Please input at least {min}-{max} characters, with only lower cases and numeric combinations
ko.667108003: Data has existed, please confirm and re-enter!
ko.domain_lobby_info_2: 기존레벨 설정 보류하기: 현재 「단독설정」대주주-파트너 레벨을 보류합니다.홀 관리자가 게임 오픈할 때 영향을 미치지 않습니다.
ko.domain_lobby_info_1_1: 일회용 실행하기 때문에 현재 「존재의 계정」인  설정만 저장가능하며 저장 후 선택항목을 「기존레벨 설정 보류하기」에  돌아갑니다.
ko.domain_lobby_info_1_2: 앞으로 「새로운 계정」은 소속하는 위층에 변경하지 않다는 경우 계정을 일체 오픈으로 설정합니다. 새로운 게임 플랫폼도 마찬가지입니다.
ko.domain_lobby_alert_1: 일회용 실행하기 때문에 현재 「존재의 계정」인  설정만 저장가능하며 저장 후 선택항목을 「기존레벨 설정 보류하기」에  돌아갑니다.
ko.domain_lobby_info_3_2: 게임 플랫폼 오픈하는 동시에「{link}」에 가서 게임의 스위치도 오픈하세요.
ko.warning_msg: 이번에 저장 시 변결한 내용이 없습니다.

th.domain_lobby_info_1_1: It’s a one-time operation. Only the current “existing accounts” can be taken effect. Once saved, the selected items will be returned to “reserve original settings”.
th.domain_lobby_info_1_2: In the future, if the “new account’s” upper level hasn’t been changed, account will be set to On. The same goes for new Game Hall.
th.domain_lobby_alert_1: It’s a one-time operation. Only the current “existing accounts” can be taken effect. Once saved, the selected items will be returned to “reserve original settings”.
th.game_switch: เปิดปิดเกมส์
th.domain_lobby_info_3_2: When open a Game Hall, please go to “{link}” to turn on the game switch at the same time.
th.warning_msg: ไม่มีการเปลี่ยนแปลงใดๆในบันทึกครั้งนี้
th.platform_game_settings_error_2: 送出厅主总共 {total} 笔，失败 {fail_count} 笔
th.domain_lobby_alert_3: 「只开厅主」需花费长时间执行强制关闭该厅所有大股东-代理层级，请确认是否执行以下厅主：
th.domain_lobby_alert_2: It’s a one-time operation. Only the current “existing accounts” can be taken effect. Do you want to close?
th.perm_affect_alert: 将滑鼠移至权限上，可于【？】图示，查看影响的功能
